tiles.title: Default branch alert activity last 180 days
Weekly default branch alert activity trend

queries.text:
code_scanning_alert
| where alert_dismissed_reason != "" and alert_updated_at > ago(180d)
| summarize arg_max(alert_updated_at, *) by alert_number, repository_id
| summarize count() by alert_dismissed_reason

code_scanning_alert
| where alert_updated_at > ago(180d) and action != "appeared_in_branch" and ref == strcat("refs/heads/", repository_default_branch)
| summarize arg_max(alert_updated_at, *) by repository_id, alert_number, action
| summarize count() by action

code_scanning_alert
| where action != "appeared_in_branch" and ref == strcat("refs/heads/", repository_default_branch) // Filter out any events due to branch activity
| summarize arg_max(alert_updated_at, *) by repository_id, alert_number, action // Dedupe by taking latest event for repository_id+alert_number+action
| summarize count() by bin(alert_updated_at, 7d), action // Bucket by time 7d time interval
| render timechart

code_scanning_alert
| where action != "appeared_in_branch" and ref == strcat("refs/heads/", repository_default_branch) // Filter out any events due to branch activity
| summarize arg_max(alert_updated_at, *) by repository_id, alert_number, action // Dedupe by taking latest event for repository_id+alert_number+action
| where action == "fixed"
| extend age=alert_updated_at-alert_created_at
| project repository_id, alert_number, action, alert_created_at, alert_updated_at, age
| make-series count() default=0 on age step 7d
| mvexpand count_, age
| extend count_=tolong(count_), age=1+tolong(format_timespan(totimespan(age), "d"))/7

code_scanning_alert
| where action == "fixed" and ref == strcat("refs/heads/", repository_default_branch) // Filter out any events due to branch activity
| summarize arg_max(alert_updated_at, *) by repository_id, alert_number, action // Dedupe by taking latest event for repository_id+alert_number+action
| extend age=tolong(format_timespan(alert_updated_at-alert_created_at, "d"))
| project age
| summarize median=percentile(age, 50)
| extend median=strcat(median, " days")
